With high hopes, I tried to download it again, but it made my phone shut down!!!ğŸ™€As I tried to turn my phone back on, I noticed my reflection on the black screen. My hair had turned into spaghetti noodles!!!!ğŸ™€ğŸ˜¾ğŸ˜¿ Iâ€™m very upset. This app has turned my hair into noodles, and now I donâ€™t have any friends.

attributes.title: ğŸ˜¬ğŸ˜¬ğŸ˜¬
attributes.review: This app was a waste of my time, I downloaded it expecting to be informed but then it ask you for wayyyyy to much information and Iâ€™m just not okay with that. Donâ€™t download this app.. creators please fix everything. Start at the beginning and then scrap the idea and apply your knowledge and skill in a more constructive way. Donâ€™t use your years of app development knowledge to serve a Cheeto. This said Cheeto wouldnâ€™t ask you for a pastrami sandwich. Or ask you to bring him a branded bottle of water, before acknowledging your talents. Do better, donâ€™t download this app.

attributes.title: Would give 0 stars if I could
attributes.review: Downloaded this so my parents could follow the campaign. Absolutely a terrible app. Not only is it glitchy but half the time it doesnâ€™t even open. I was really hoping that this app would help my parents decide to vote this September but itâ€™s so bad that itâ€™s not even worth the download. All in all a terrible app and not useful whatsoever. Stick to the internet campaigns even if itâ€™s charged 9$ every time some opens an ad. I donâ€™t wanna take money away from the trump for his paid advertising but this app is the worst!!

attributes.title: Call Spencer Reid
attributes.review: If I could rate this app 0 stars, I would. This app personally attacked me as it grew arms and legs and beat me. It did not even offer to pay the hospital bill. Iâ€™m currently in the hospital typing with my left big toe as both of my arms are shattered. I attempted to call the police, however, they were unresponsive as I am a black transgender woman. The oppression in this country is astronomical. I turned to the only person I could think of, dr. Spencer Reid. This kind man with a heart of gold (unlike mr. Trump), paid my hospital bill and is helping me learn to walk again. Spencer Reid for president 2020â¤ï¸

attributes.title: Absolutely awful
attributes.review: I got this app so that i could see events and stuff for our oh so great president so imagine how I felt when i was failed and greeted by a glitchy screen, my cat even died after seeing the app and this app offers so much false information and glitches.  I regret getting this app, not to mention how long it took to download in the first place!  I swear I've been waiting for 10 days for it to download.  Im conclusion this app is a waste of time and i know have to go buy a new phone because the glitch was my phone broke ğŸ˜¡ğŸ˜¡ğŸ˜¤.

attributes.title: DISGUSTING
attributes.review: i was very interested to see what trump had to offer on his app, but upon opening, i was met by a furious and offensive trump calling me various slurs??? i was beyond offended, i was appalled, but thought maybe it was a glitch. but then i looked out the window in my living room and there he stood, trump and his goonies. they started to march up and down the street yelling the same slurs! i went back to the app and it was a just a black screen that said in white writing â€œthe time is now.â€ the time is now for what?? i am scared and appalled that this happened and i beg you all, DO NOT DOWNLOAD
